Text:
How do i know if FLAC Files on TPB are realy 24bits Studio Kwality, and not some converted 16bit CD-ROM to FLAC 24bit ???
Are people using some therms for it so we know it's realy the original 24bit studio kwality ???
softwarecheck you can analysis the waveforms with an editor like Wavelab or Audacity. If I remember correctly the dynamic range of 16-bit is 96db and for 24-bit is 122db.
Anyone know if someone has a rip with the two bonus tracks?
